H0.text: In which year was the Juilliard School founded in New York. 1880

H1.text: In which year was the Juilliard School founded in New York. 1892

H2.text: In which year was the Juilliard School founded in New York. 1910

H3.text: In which year was the Juilliard School founded in New York. 1905

A4.text: Founded by Frank Damrosch as the Institute of Musical Art in 1905, the school later added dance and drama programs and became the Juilliard School

A5.text: In 1905, the Institute of Musical Art (IMA), Juilliard's predecessor institution, was founded by Frank Damrosch
